E-MTAB-5200-ST0.full_description: Requests the /studies/:id endpoint using study id in config file. Checks content type and status code (200). Validates response body matches study schema in the specification.

E-MTAB-5200-ST0.text: Study not found endpoint correctly implemented
full_message: {"message":"Store error: No data found for this key"}
E-MTAB-5200-ST0.full_description: Requests the /studies/:id endpoint using a study id that is known to not exist. Checks content type and status code (4xx). Validates response body matches error schema in the specification.

E-MTAB-5200-ST0.name: study_search
E-MTAB-5200-ST0.text: Studies can be retrieved through the search endpoint
E-MTAB-5200-ST0.full_description: Requests the /studies/search endpoint without any parameter filters. Checks content type and status code (200). Validates response body matches study array schema in the specification.

E-MTAB-5200-ST0.name: study_search_url_params_all
E-MTAB-5200-ST0.text: Studies can be retrieved using URL parameters through the search endpoint
E-MTAB-5200-ST0.full_description: Requests the /studies/search endpoint using all parameter filters in config file. Checks content type and status code (200). Validates response body matches study array schema in the specification.

E-MTAB-5200-ST0.name: study_search_url_params_cases
E-MTAB-5200-ST0.text: Studies can be retrieved using URL parameters through the search endpoint for all cases
E-MTAB-5200-ST0.full_description: Performs multiple requests of the /studies/search endpoint, each time using a different parameter filter in config file. Checks content type and status code (200). Validates response body matches study array schema in the specification.

E-MTAB-5200-ST0.name: study_search_filters_out
E-MTAB-5200-ST0.text: Study search endpoint successfully filters out non-matching objects
E-MTAB-5200-ST0.full_description: Requests the /studies/search endpoint using parameter filters that do not apply to any study. Checks content type and status code (200). Validates response body is an empty array.

E-MTAB-5200-ST0.name: study_search_filters
E-MTAB-5200-ST0.text: Study filters can be retrieved through the search endpoint
E-MTAB-5200-ST0.full_description: Requests the /studies/search/filters endpoint. Checks content type and status code (200). Validates response body matches search filter array schema in the specification.

8beada7b93d5e55aa557138b39c6f930.name: expression_search_url_params_all

8beada7b93d5e55aa557138b39c6f930.name: expression_search_url_params_cases

8beada7b93d5e55aa557138b39c6f930.name: expression_search_filters_out
8beada7b93d5e55aa557138b39c6f930.text: Expression search endpoint successfully filters out non-matching objects

8beada7b93d5e55aa557138b39c6f930.name: expression_search_format_not_specified
8beada7b93d5e55aa557138b39c6f930.text: Expression search endpoint appropriately raises error when format not specified
8beada7b93d5e55aa557138b39c6f930.full_description: Requests the /expressions/search endpoint without specifying the required 'format' parameter. Checks content type and status code (4xx). Validates response body is an error message JSON.

8beada7b93d5e55aa557138b39c6f930.name: expression_search_filetypes_match
8beada7b93d5e55aa557138b39c6f930.text: Expression search returns expression objects with fileType matching specified format
8beada7b93d5e55aa557138b39c6f930.full_description: Requests the /expressions/search endpoint with 'format' parameter specified. Checks content type and status code (200). Validates expression objects in response body contain a fileType that matches the requested format.

8beada7b93d5e55aa557138b39c6f930.name: expression_search_no_filetype_mismatches
8beada7b93d5e55aa557138b39c6f930.text: Expression search returns expression objects with fileType matching specified format when requested format is modified
8beada7b93d5e55aa557138b39c6f930.full_description: Requests the /expressions/search endpoint with 'format' parameter that does not match the format specified in config file. Checks content type and status code (200). Validates expression objects in response body have a fileType matching the requested format.

8beada7b93d5e55aa557138b39c6f930.name: expression_search_filters
8beada7b93d5e55aa557138b39c6f930.text: Expression filters can be retrieved through the search endpoint
8beada7b93d5e55aa557138b39c6f930.full_description: Requests the /expressions/search/filters endpoint. Checks content type and status code (200). Validates response body matches search filter array schema in the specification.
